price: Àwọn òpìdán sì dé wá bá Fir‘aon. Wọ́n wí pé: “Dájúdájú ẹ̀san gbọ́dọ̀ wà fún wa tí àwa bá jẹ́ olùborí.”
arabic: وَجَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ فِرۡعَوۡنَ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجۡرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحۡنُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wajāa al-saḥaratu fir'ʿawna qālū inna lanā la-ajran in kunnā naḥnu al-ghālibīna
